name: Crate Cables
description:
A short puzzle game where you construct cables from crates to connect nodes together. About 20 levels in all.

mobile-friendly link: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=ed2b94c9afaf9f7c0ae87dfb85f92004

hack this game: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=ed2b94c9afaf9f7c0ae87dfb85f92004
